title: Verify Offers>Create module> Can able to Save Offer with out any issues.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Year = 2017
AND Sport = MLB
AND League = American League
AND Team = Baltimore Orioles
custom_steps:
WHEN Offer/Promotion Name = Regress[VersionNumber] (mandatory field)
AND Season = Regular (mandatory field)
AND Display Status = Prod
AND Offer Description = Enter any description ex. TEST Offer Desc
AND Offer Description(Spanish) = Enter any description ex. TEST Offer Desc Spanish
AND Other = Enter any description ex. TEST other 
AND Offer Type = Select any one ex. At Bat Check-in-Offer
AND Promotion Type = Select any one ex. Cap (mandatory field) 
AND Offer Plan = Single Game 
AND Offer Group =Default
AND Display In: Select any one or multiple boxes. ex. Promotions / Schedule / AtBat / SingleGame
AND checked boxes : Home / Away / and Show Past Events.
AND Primary Events Mapping: Offer Plan: Regress[VersionNumber] ex. single game
AND Offer Group : Regress[VersionNumber] ex. Default
AND Primary Events: select any date 
AND Tlink Detail Info: Site Section: Default / Ticket Category: Ticket / Sub Category: Default
AND Leave Tlink- URL Override = Empty
AND Primary Events: select any date 
AND Tlink Detail Info: Site Section: Default / Ticket Category: Ticket / Sub Category: Default
AND Leave Tlink- URL Override = Empty
AND expand Promotion Detail Information: 
AND Wired tab: Presented by: Regress[VersionNumber] / Distribution: Regress[VersionNumber] / Image URL: and Thumb Nail Image URL will be auto populated link for you. / Alt Page URL: Regress[VersionNumber] put any link. / Sort Key: select any number ex. 3. 
AND clicking “Save Offer"
custom_expected: THEN "Your Offer has been saved" is displayed.

title: Offer>Search>Search the offer that you have saved earlier in Test Case(1229648)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Year = 2017
AND Sport = MLB
AND League = American League
AND Team = Baltimore Orioles
custom_steps: WHEN clicking 'Get Offers' button
custom_expected: THEN Should see offer that you have created in test case 1229648.

title: Offer>Offer Plan>> Give any Offer Plan name

custom_steps: THEN Click 'Add New Plan' button
custom_expected: THEN 'Offer Plan saved successfully' is displayed.

title: Mange Event Mappings>Event ReMapping> Save Sub Category
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Event Management>Event ReMapping
AND Year: 2017
AND Sport: MLB
AND League: AL
AND Team: Baltimore Orioles
AND click 'Get Event' button
AND select from 'Old Events you want to change:  ex. 2/26/17 and New events you want to change to: Mar 5, 2017.  
AND click 'Map Events' button. 
AND will display under 'Events to map' section.  (old event you want to change / new event)  
AND select User New Game PK= Yes.
custom_steps:
WHEN click 'Save' button
AND user gets pop up message... System may encounter duplicate records.  See (Message SS).  
AND click 'Copy over Values' button'

Note:  (get a message: mapping already exists for the highlighted games(s))<<--  If you get this message select different event from the 'New Events you want to change to' until you are able to save.
custom_expected:
THEN get a message 'Mapping saved successfully'.

Note: Verify under Existing Mappings section window.  Should see event that you have selected with today's date stamp.

title: Middleware>>FrontEnd/API Testing>>Purchase ticket for Milwaukee Brewers  (Not Automated)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Service = http://ticksys.gen.qa.mlbam.net/middleware/sync
AND Source = ballpark - Ballpark-owner TBD
AND Year = 2018
AND Team = Milwaukee Brewers:158
AND Venue = Auto Selected
AND Game PK = Sep 28, 2018, Fri, detmlb vs milmlb
AND MLB Flow = BALLPARK
AND Ticket Filter = Don’t select anything
AND Ticket Type = Standard
AND rest Fields leave empty:  Grouping/No of Tickets/ Coupon Code.
custom_steps:
WHEN the "Get Availability" button is clicked
AND "No. of Tickets" in the result set is set to 1 (if '1' not work and get error message [Vendor Error. Unable to find seats matching your request]
then enter '2') 
AND the "Buy Now" button is clicked
AND enter following fields:  
        - First Name: Your First name
        - Last Name:  Your Last Name
        - Email: Your mlb email address.
AND 'Use Wallet' display 
AND select any one credit cared ex. 'Visa_1105' and enter CVV=123
AND Contact First Name = Give any name (Ex. your First Name)
AND Contact Last Name = Give any name (Ex. your Last Name)
AND click 'Checkout' button
custom_expected:
THEN 'Your Order Has Been Successfully Place!'  message displayed.  

Note: User should get confirmation email.  (Open MLB email- to verify)

title: Middleware>>FrontEnd/API Testing>>Purchase ticket for Colorado Rockies   (Not Automated)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Service = http://ticksys.gen.qa.mlbam.net/middleware/sync
AND Source = ballpark - Ballpark-owner TBD
AND Year = 2018
AND Team = Milwaukee Brewers:158
AND Venue = Auto Selected
AND Game PK = Sep 28, 2018, Fri, detmlb vs milmlb
AND MLB Flow = BALLPARK
AND Ticket Filter = Don’t select anything
AND Ticket Type = Standard
AND rest Fields leave empty:  Grouping/No of Tickets/ Coupon Code.
custom_steps:
WHEN the "Get Availability" button is clicked
AND "No. of Tickets" in the result set is set to 1 (if '1' not work and get error message [Vendor Error. Unable to find seats matching your request]
then enter '2') 
AND the "Buy Now" button is clicked
AND enter following fields:  
        - First Name: Your First name
        - Last Name:  Your Last Name
        - Email: Your mlb email address.
        - Refresh Token: ( you will get this number by clicking 'Click here' link. (Note: you might have to login to Ticket Master to get refresh token.  You might have to register yourself to ticketing master site.)  Ask Mitch if need further help.  Ticket Master url link >> https://oauth.ticketmaster.com/)
AND 'Use Wallet' display 
        - Click Authorize and copy 'Refresh Token' number.  (ex. f6a053c005998c7707e82bb4360fa889185ba372)  
AND select any one credit cared ex. 'Visa_0011' and enter CVV=123
AND Contact First Name = Give any name (Ex. your First Name)
AND Contact Last Name = Give any name (Ex. your Last Name)
AND click 'Checkout' button
custom_expected:
THEN 'Your Order Has Been Successfully Place!'  message displayed.  

Note: User should get confirmation email.  (Open MLB email- to verify)

title: Other>>URL Shortener>>Generate Short URL.

GIVEN
Other>URL Shortner
'Short URL' radio button is checked

Directory: /tix
URL Value: www.mlb.com

WHEN expanding "-URL Shortner Customizations (Not Required)"
AND entering "RegressVersionNumber" for the URL Key
AND clicking the "Generate Short URL" button

AND clicking "Ok" dismisses the window
AND the URL is displayed as "Short URL" in the lower right: http://qa.mlb.am/tix/RegressVersionNumber

title: Other>>Hash Generator>>Input URL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
Other>Hash Generate 
AND the URL "http://kansascity.royals.mlb.com/index.jsp?c_id=kc” is entered under "Input URL"
custom_steps: WHEN the “Generate Hash" button is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN the "URL with Hash" box populates with a hashed URL (http://kansascity.royals.mlb.com/index.jsp?c_id=kc&request_time=06/27/2016-13:45&hval=9cec71aab37b37242cd1a6771af9515012367d8d)

Note: This url link won't be same, it will be different. Should see today's date stamp.

title: Other>>Hash Generator>>Verify with Hash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
Other>Hash Generate 
AND the URL "http://kansascity.royals.mlb.com/index.jsp?c_id=kc" is entered under "Input URL"
AND the "Generate Hash" was button clicked 
AND under URL with Hash display : http://kansascity.royals.mlb.com/index.jsp?c_id=kc&request_time=06/17/2016-11:57&hval=75052595abd787e8e1d032bbbeb5a7b18c25a7d2
custom_steps: WHEN the hashed URL displayed under "URL with Hash" box (ex: http://kansascity.royals.mlb.com/index.jsp?c_id=kc&request_time=06/27/2016-13:45&hval=9cec71aab37b37242cd1a6771af9515012367d8d) copy this link and paste this link into NEW tab browser.
custom_expected: THEN the Kansas City Royals home page loads in the web browser
